detail_description: Restaurante Xica da Silva is a casual and family-style restaurant known for serving the best Moqueca in Brazil. The portions are generous and perfect for sharing with 2-4 people. Despite the small flies inside, the food and service are top-notch, making it a highlight of any trip. The modern atmosphere and friendly staff make it a must-visit spot on the island.
name: Restaurante Xica da Silva ️
address: Alameda das Acácias, 11 - Floresta Nova, Fernando de Noronha - PE, 53990-000, Brazil

detail_description: Bar do Meio Noronha is a vibrant beach bar and restaurant located near the center, offering a perfect setting to enjoy beachside drinks and delicious food. The wooden terrace with a thatched roof provides a cozy atmosphere to savor chilled cocktails and appetizers while listening to live music. It's best visited in the late afternoon for an ideal seat to watch the sunset over Praia de Conceicao. The place can get busy, so booking ahead is recommended.
name: Bar do Meio Noronha
address: Estrada da Alamoa, 130 - Praia do Meio, Fernando de Noronha - PE, 53990-000, Brazil

detail_description: Restaurante Cacimba Bistrô is a must-visit on the island of Fernando de Noronha. Despite the higher prices, this place offers delicious and generous portions of food with fast and friendly service. The menu includes shrimp with rice, sun-dried meat, peixe na manteiga com molho verde, American Gim with Violeta, and phenomenal desserts like brownie with ice cream.
name: Restaurante Cacimba
address: R. Dom Juquinha I, 310, Fernando de Noronha - PE, 53990-000, Brazil

detail_description: O Pico is a charming restaurant located in Fernando de Noronha, known for its delicious food and stylish ambiance. The menu offers a variety of options including Shrimp Risotto and flavorful vegan dishes like tajine and stew. The restaurant also boasts a trendy decor and vibe, making it an ideal spot for a special occasion or casual dining experience. Visitors have praised the friendly staff, with particular mention of bartender Flavio and waitress Camila who provided excellent service and recommendations.
name: O Pico
address: Praça dos Remédios, S/N, Fernando de Noronha, Fernando de Noronha - PE, 53990-000, Brazil

detail_description: Flamboyant Rock Restaurant F.Noronha offers a delightful lunch experience with its affordable and delicious chicken sandwich served with delectable fries. The prices are considered reasonable for the island, making it a great choice for a satisfying meal without breaking the bank.
name: Flamboyant Rock Restaurant F.Noronha
address: BR 363, S/N Vila dos Remédios, Fernando de Noronha - PE, 53990-000, Brazil

detail_description: Barraca das Gêmeas is a simple and authentic beach restaurant located in a convenient area easily accessible by taxi or rental car. The restaurant offers a wonderful lunch experience with fresh fish as their flagship dish, cooked to perfection and served with tasty side dishes. The friendly service adds to the overall enjoyable dining experience. Visitors can order their meal and then head to the beach while it's being prepared, making it a great option for those looking to combine delicious food with beach relaxation.
name: Barraca das Gêmeas
address: Fernando de Noronha - PE, 53990-000, Brazil

detail_description: Restaurante Zé Maria in Noronha offers a unique dining experience with dishes named after regular guests. The menu features creative seafood dishes like fish with mint and jambu sauce served with squid rice and grilled banana, as well as the "sinfonia maritima" showcasing six types of seafood in tomato and coconut sauce.
name: Restaurante Zé Maria - Noronha
address: RUA NICE CORDEIRO, 01 FLORESTA VELHA Fernando de Noronha (Distrito Estadual, PE, 53990-000, Brazil

detail_description: Manaka Sushi Noronha is a perfect destination for sushi and Japanese cuisine enthusiasts. The restaurant offers a variety of fresh and creative options, providing a true fusion of flavors in a relaxed and welcoming atmosphere. With high-quality sushi prepared in the traditional style by Chef Igor, featuring the freshest fish of the day, visitors can indulge in an amazing culinary experience. The menu includes good combinations of sashimi and sushi, with recommendations to try dishes featuring local island fish for guaranteed success.
name: Manaka Sushi Noronha
address: Alameda das Acácias, 556 Floresta Nova Fernando de Noronha (Distrito Estadual, Fernando de Noronha - PE, 53990-000, Brazil

excerpt: Chic hotel with an airy restaurant, an infinity pool & a spa, plus free breakfast & ocean views.
detail_description: Pousada Maravilha is a chic hotel located on a special island, offering an incredible experience with friendly staff who go out of their way to ensure a memorable stay. The rooms are impeccably clean and offer unbelievable ocean views. Guests can enjoy superb food at the airy restaurant and take in the spectacular view from the infinity pool area. The attention to detail from every staff member is extraordinary, creating a warm and welcoming atmosphere.
name: Pousada Maravilha
address: Vila do Vai Quem Sabe Distrito Estadual, BR-363, s/n, Fernando de Noronha - PE, 53990-000, Brazil

detail_description: Empório São Miguel is known for its friendly and accommodating staff, who are willing to assist non-Portuguese speakers. While the open bar is only available during lunch hours, the staff goes out of their way to cater to dietary preferences, such as offering vegetarian options. Visitors can expect excellent service and delicious food, with the added convenience of English-speaking assistance.
name: Empório São Miguel
address: Distrito Estadual, R. São Miguel, 186 - Centro, Fernando de Noronha - PE, 53900-000, Brazil

detail_description: Tempero da Mãezinha offers a diverse dining experience with both self-service and à la carte options. The lunch buffet provides a variety of delicious and fresh foods priced reasonably by the kilogram. In addition to the flavorful seasoning, there are multiple protein and bean choices available. While some find the pricing fair for the quality and quantity of food, others consider it expensive, especially for additional items like fried eggs.
name: Tempero da Mãezinha
address: Distrito Estadual, R. São Miguel, Fernando de Noronha - PE, 53990-000, Brazil

excerpt: Airy rooms & suites in a casual hotel with breakfast, plus an outdoor pool & a restaurant.
name: Dolphin Noronha Villa Hotel
address: Rodovia BR-363 s/n, Fernando de Noronha - PE, 53990-000, Brazil

name: Maré Comida com Vida - Noronha
address: Distrito Estadual, R. São Miguel, 116, Fernando de Noronha - PE, 53990-000, Brazil

name: Restaurante Tricolor
address: br 363 136 vila do boldro, Fernando de Noronha - PE, 53990-000, Brazil

detail_description: Restaurante Du Mar is a seafood restaurant with a cozy bistro-style atmosphere in Noronha. The owner, Claudio, is known for his excellent service and dedication to ensuring customer satisfaction. One standout feature of this restaurant is its transfer service, where they pick up and drop off customers anywhere on the island, making it convenient for visitors. The restaurant offers delicious food at reasonable prices and provides a great dining option for those looking to enjoy a meal before departing from the island.
name: Restaurante Du Mar
address: BR-363, Fernando de Noronha - PE, 53990-000, Brazil

detail_description: Restaurante Varanda Noronha Frutos do Mar offers an elegant and cozy outdoor dining experience with excellent service. Despite a few initial errors, the staff is warm and welcoming, ensuring a pleasant visit. The shrimp risotto comes highly recommended for its incredible taste. While it may be pricier than other options on the island, the spacious outdoor seating and excellent service make it worth the cost. Dishes like moqueca and fruit juices are highlighted as excellent choices.
name: Restaurante Varanda Noronha
address: R. Maj. Costa, 130 - Vila do Trinta, Fernando de Noronha - PE, 53990-000, Brazil

detail_description: Mergulhão Noronha offers a nice atmosphere and delicious food, with a particular highlight being the octopus and fish with banana. The coconut rice and vinaigrette are also highly recommended. Although some details could be improved, such as the cooking of the squid and fish, overall it comes highly recommended. It's a great spot to enjoy the morro view, the restored fort, and the sunset while sipping on a caipirinha.
name: Mergulhão Noronha
address: Fernando de Noronha - PE, 53990-000, Brazil

detail_description: Restaurante do Vale offers a cozy and intimate atmosphere with dim candlelit lighting, making it a popular spot that operates on a reservation basis. The decor exudes an island jungle vibe, complete with personalized chalkboard reservations. The food is highly recommended for its delicious and flavorful dishes, such as the tuna tartare. While some found the shrimp risotto slightly heavy on cheese, overall, visitors enjoyed their dining experience. The restaurant's staff received praise for their friendliness and attentive service.
name: Restaurante do Vale
address: R. Pescador Sérgio Lino, 160, Fernando de Noronha - PE, 53990-000, Brazil

detail_description: Bar Duda Rei is a fantastic beach bar located next to Praia da Conceicao beach, offering stunning views of the white sandy beach and clear sea. The laid-back venue provides tables and chairs on the sand with thatched umbrellas for shade. Guests can enjoy a bucket of ice-covered beer to keep it chilled. This bar is known for its excellent cocktails, creating a great beach atmosphere with surfing vibes. It's an ideal spot to watch the beautiful sunset or have drinks by the beach.
name: Bar Duda Rei
address: Praia da Conceicao, Fernando de Noronha - PE, 53990-000, Brazil

detail_description: Pizzaria na Moita is known for its delicious and well-stuffed pizzas, making it the best place for dinner on the island. Customers have raved about their marguerita pizza, expressing surprise at how tasty it was. Many have also praised the reasonable prices, considering it a great value for Noronha. Additionally, the delivery service comes with a small fee but is deemed worth it by satisfied customers.
name: Namoita Pizzaria
address: Rua dom Juquinha, s/n - Distrito Estadual, Fernando de Noronha - PE, 53990-000, Brazil

detail_description: Delícias da Ná offers a warm and cozy jungle atmosphere, making it a popular spot for lunch. The menu is extensive, but the fish and shrimp moqueca comes highly recommended by the attentive waitstaff. Diners praise the fresh and flavorful seafood, as well as the accommodating service. It's also noted as a wonderful choice for a personalized romantic dinner experience with freshly prepared food. While some mention that dishes may take time to be cooked, this is considered normal for this island setting.
name: Delícias da Ná
address: R. Dom Juquinha I - Vila do trinta, Fernando de Noronha - PE, 53990-000, Brazil

detail_description: Cigana Do Cajueiro - Gastrobar e Galeria is a restaurant on Noronha that offers authorial dishes and cocktails. While some find it pricier with smaller portions compared to other places on the island, others appreciate the whole experience, including the history of the place, food, and drinks. The restaurant provides indoor and outdoor seating and is known for its flavorful meat sandwich served in fresh bread and refreshing lemonade.
name: Cigana Do Cajueiro - Gastrobar e Galeria
address: R. Maj. Costa, 161 - Vila do Trinta, Fernando de Noronha - PE, 53990-000, Brazil

detail_description: Restaurante Valdenio offers a genuine local experience with its warm and welcoming service and reasonable prices compared to other establishments on the island. The no-frills atmosphere and small selection of chicken and meat dishes add to its authentic charm. Visitors praise the tender and flavorful meat stew, highlighting the restaurant as a perfect spot for enjoying Brazilian cuisine at great value. It's described as a breath of fresh air in an expensive area, allowing visitors to dine like locals while savoring tasty food options.
name: Restaurante Valdenio
address: Ilha Fernando de Noronha, Brazil

detail_description: Mesa da Ana is a must-visit spot in Noronha, offering an exceptional gastronomic experience. The hosts, Ana and Roque, warmly welcome guests and engage them in delightful conversations. Ana's culinary skills shine through the carefully curated menu featuring locally sourced ingredients and flavors. Each dish is not only beautifully presented but also boasts a unique blend of tastes.
name: Mesa da Ana
address: Fernando de Noronha Environmental Protection Area, R. Maj. Costa, Fernando de Noronha - PE, 53990-000, Brazil

detail_description: Muzenza Gastronomia e Cultura is a lively bar located near the Nossa Senhora dos Remedios Church in Noronha. It's a great spot to enjoy drinks, dance, and have fun with friends. The venue also functions as a show house and offers a variety of pizzas, pastas, and snacks. Visitors can expect attentive service and delicious thin-crust pizzas with flavorful toppings. Additionally, the restaurant transforms into a party atmosphere with live shows later in the evening.
name: Muzenza Gastronomia e Cultura
address: Terminal Turístico do Cachorro, Ilha, Distrito Estadual, Fernando de Noronha - PE, 53990-000, Brazil

detail_description: Restaurante da Edilma is known for its delicious food at affordable prices, making it a popular choice among visitors. The restaurant is renowned for serving the best moqueca on the island, a dish that attracts many patrons. With its top-notch offerings, Restaurante da Edilma has established itself as a must-visit dining spot for those seeking quality meals without breaking the bank.
name: Restaurante da Edilma
address: Rua São Miguel, 17, Vila dos Remédios, Fernando de Noronha (Distrito Estadual) - PE, 53990-000, Brazil

detail_description: Restaurante AcquaMarine is considered one of the best dining spots in Noronha, offering well-served dishes with delicious seasoning. The average cost for an individual dish is around 100 reais. Guests can enjoy their meal in a closed environment with air conditioning or opt for the open and pleasant pool area, depending on the weather. While it may be a bit pricey, the restaurant's fish and salad options are highly recommended by visitors.
name: Restaurante AcquaMarine
address: Dolphin Hotel, Fernando de Noronha - PE, Brazil

detail_description: Fernão El Loco is a lively restaurant with a fun and relaxed atmosphere. The menu highlights tapas and drinks, and many dishes have unique names like "Criado por vo" and "Lagosta rockn roll de Pedrito el loco." Visitors praise the friendly staff who are accommodating to requests. The food is described as tasty, well-prepared, and nicely presented at reasonable prices. Guests particularly enjoyed the well-served dishes and expressed intentions of returning for more.
name: Fernão El Loco - tapas e drinks
address: Rua Padre Gurgel, 3550 - Boldró, Fernando de Noronha - PE, 53990-000, Brazil

detail_description: Restaurante Point da Cacimba is a great place to dine when you're really hungry. The owner prepares excellent food, offering fish, chicken, and meat options that are both baked and fried with a delicious homemade taste. Located next to a competing restaurant at Cacimba do Padre beach, the simple wooden tables and dirt floor create a pleasant environment for enjoying the meal.
name: Restaurante Point da Cacimba
address: Ao Lado Barraca das Gemeas, Unnamed Rd, Fernando de Noronha - PE, 53990-000, Brazil

detail_description: Casa Salviano is an incredible establishment that offers a unique experience. It is a family-oriented restaurant where the owner personally catches the fish, showcasing his humility. The menu boasts a variety of delectable rolls, all of which are exceptional and contain an abundance of fish and minimal rice. Instead of serving hot sake, they provide a selection of cold sake and excellent wines.
name: Casa Salviano
address: BR-363, Fernando de Noronha - PE, 53990-000, Brazil

detail_description: Restaurante do Jacaré, located in Fernando de Noronha, is known for offering affordable and delicious meals. The restaurant has a simple setup with tables and chairs, and it offers a self-service buffet with a variety of traditional dishes like rice, beans, different types of meat, pasta, potatoes, and salads. The atmosphere is welcoming and reminiscent of home cooking. It's an ideal spot for a balanced meal at a fair price while exploring the nearby beaches or village.
name: Restaurante do Jacaré
address: Fernando de Noronha - PE, 53990-000, Brazil

detail_description: Forno Noronha is a popular spot that serves delicious pizza at night. The menu includes English translations, which is not common on the island. A large pizza costs around 100 R$ and a medium one about 70 R$. Additionally, there's an automatic 10% "service charge" added to each order, but it can be declined if you're not satisfied with the service. It's recommended for its tasty pizzas and reasonable prices.
name: Forno Noronha
address: Arquipelago de Fernando de Noronha, Fernando de Noronha - PE, 53990-000, Brazil

detail_description: Bio Bistrot Noronha offers an incredible dining experience with its amazing organic and plant-based food. The chef and staff are known for their friendliness, care, and love, which is reflected in the well-balanced and delicious dishes they serve. The menu features a variety of options including arroz de couves, grilled fish, vatapa de inhame, and caramelized bananas for dessert.
name: Bio Bistrot Noronha
address: Distrito Estadual, R. São Miguel, 183, Fernando de Noronha - PE, 53990-000, Brazil

name: Palhoça da Colina Bar e Restaurante
address: Estrada da Colina, 04, Vila do Trinta, Fernando de Noronha (Distrito Estadual) - PE, 53990-000, Brazil

detail_description: Dom Black is a popular spot known for its delicious and generous hamburgers, as well as abundant and tasty fries. The service is quick and efficient, despite the usual crowds. Visitors praise the pleasant atmosphere of the place. Whether you prefer an Australian or brioche bun, both options are highly recommended. Even those accustomed to great meat from Argentina find the burgers at Dom Black to be beyond expectations in terms of taste and quality.
name: Dom Black
address: Rua, Alameda da Harmonia - Floresta Nova, Fernando de Noronha - PE, 53990-000, Brazil

detail_description: Creperia Euforonha offers delicious and light crepes, although some find the prices to be on the higher side. The atmosphere is enjoyable with live music, creating a lively vibe. However, due to city restrictions, dancing may not be possible at the moment. The service is fast and efficient, and many appreciate the tasty crepes and friendly staff.
name: Creperia Euforonha
address: Distrito Estadual, BR-363 Praça do flamboyant, Fernando de Noronha - PE, 53990-000, Brazil

excerpt: Serene island guesthouse with a restaurant & rustic-chic bungalows offering ocean views.
detail_description: Pousada Solar dos Ventos is a tranquil island retreat featuring a restaurant and charming bungalows that offer picturesque ocean views. Guests have praised the attentive and friendly staff, luxurious rooms, and stunning grounds. The small details such as nightly desserts in the room, afternoon tea with cake, and impeccable service have been appreciated by visitors.
name: Pousada Nannai Noronha Solar dos Ventos
address: Vila do Vai Quem Sabe Distrito Estadual, BR-363, s/n - Distrito Estadual, Fernando de Noronha - PE, 53990-000, Brazil

detail_description: Sette Mares is a highly recommended restaurant on the island with prices that are considered below average. The dishes are known for their generous portions, and the staff, including Priscilla and Diego, are praised for their kindness and professionalism. Visitors have raved about the delicious fish moqueca that can easily serve three people. Despite being a bit pricey, guests found it to be worth it due to the delectable flavors.
name: Sette Mares
address: Rua Padre Gurgel, 168- Boldró, Fernando de Noronha, Fernando de Noronha Boldró, Fernando de Noronha - PE, 53990-000, Brazil

name: Noronha Steak House
address: Rua Eurico Cavalcanti de Albuquerque, Alameda Boldró (Distrito Estadual), Fernando de Noronha - PE, Brazil

detail_description: La Bella Noronha Pizzaria is a cozy and pleasant restaurant located in the center of Noronha. The atmosphere is delightful, and the food is delicious and well-seasoned. They offer a variety of options, including gluten-free and sugar-free brownies that are highly recommended. The pizzas are thin and crispy, with unique flavors like shrimp and Atalaia beach. The service is excellent, with friendly staff providing quick service.
name: La Bella Noronha Pizzaria
address: Distrito Estadual, R. São Miguel, 343, Fernando de Noronha - PE, 53990-970, Brazil

detail_description: Mabuya Lanches is a popular spot known for its great snacks, friendly service, and wonderful prices. While some feel that the environment could be improved, it's still considered a great place for a snack break and a cold soda. The tranquil atmosphere adds to the experience, making it an ideal spot to enjoy nice snacks with pleasant service.
name: Mabuya Lanches
address: Unnamed Road, Fernando de Noronha - PE, 53990-000, Brazil

name: Recanto da Graça
address: Ilha, Fernando de Noronha - PE, 53990-000, Brazil
